title: "Breweries map"
author: "Matt Ploenzke"
date: "1/23/2020"
output: html_document
---

Load packages.
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(osmdata)
```

Check available features.
```{r, eval=FALSE}
available_features()
available_tags("residential")
```

Pull streets data.
```{r}
location <- 'Munich Germany'
biergartens <- getbb(location) %>%
  opq()%>%
  add_osm_feature(key = "biergarten") %>%
  osmdata_sf()

breweries <- getbb(location) %>%
  opq()%>%
  add_osm_feature(key = "craft",
                  value = 'brewery') %>%
  osmdata_sf()

microbreweries <- getbb(location) %>%
  opq()%>%
  add_osm_feature(key = "microbrewery") %>%
  osmdata_sf()

streets <- getbb(location) %>%
  opq()%>%
  add_osm_feature(key = "highway", 
                  value = c("motorway", "primary")) %>%
  osmdata_sf()

transit <- getbb(location) %>%
  opq()%>%
  add_osm_feature(key = "railway",
                  value = 'subway') %>%
  osmdata_sf()

transit_stations <- getbb(location) %>%
  opq()%>%
  add_osm_feature(key = "railway",
                  value = 'stop') %>%
  osmdata_sf()
```

Pull rivers.
```{r}
rivers <- getbb(location)%>%
  opq()%>%
  add_osm_feature(key = "waterway") %>%
  osmdata_sf()
```

Plot it.
```{r}
ggplot() +  
  geom_sf(data = streets$osm_lines,
          inherit.aes = FALSE,
          color = "#000000",
          size = .4,
          alpha = .8) +
  geom_sf(data = rivers$osm_lines,
          inherit.aes = FALSE,
          color = "#7fc0ff",
          size = .4,
          alpha = .8) +
  geom_sf(data = transit$osm_lines,
          inherit.aes = FALSE,
          color = "#A900FF",
          size = .4,
          alpha = .8) + 
  geom_sf(data = transit_stations$osm_points,
          inherit.aes = FALSE,
          color = "#A900FF",
          shape=21,
          size = 1,
          alpha = 1) +
  geom_sf(data = breweries$osm_points,
          inherit.aes = FALSE,
          color = "#FF0000",
          shape=21,
          size = 1,
          alpha = 1) +
  geom_sf(data = microbreweries$osm_points,
          inherit.aes = FALSE,
          color = "#FF5700",
          shape=21,
          size = 1,
          alpha = 1) +
  geom_sf(data = biergartens$osm_points,
          inherit.aes = FALSE,
          color = "#FF5700",
          shape=1,
          size = .5,
          alpha = .5) +
  #geom_point(aes(x=-87.900582, y=41.818970),
  #        color = "#2DFF00",
  #        shape=4, 
  #        size = .8,
  #        alpha = 1) + 
  coord_sf(xlim = c(11.35, 11.75), 
           ylim = c(48.1, 48.25),
           expand = FALSE) +
  theme_void() +
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#FFFFFF"))
```
